Header: Minister Ravi Karunanayake Reveals Namal Rajapakse's Fate
Content: The fate of Parliamentarian (MP) Namal Rajapaksa can be seen within days, says Minister Ravi Karunanayake. The minister stated this while he was speaking at the UNP May Day rally. Investigations so far have revealed where Namal Rajapakse has hidden his illegally-amassed wealth and about the palaces owned by him, he stated. All those who had committed fraud and corruption during the previous regime will be made to kneel down before the people, said Mr. Ravi Karunanayake.
